name: Christin O'Brien
text: Literally everytime I order online they call me about 2 minutes after I place my order and tell me they don't have something I order. Tonight I ordered and had to cancel it all together because it was going to be a 2 hour wait. The only reason I didn't give a 1 star is because when they call they are nice about it.

name: Shad Davidson
text: Went for lunch and nothing on the buffet for 20 minutes

name: Trish Surdukan
text: Soda was flat, the ice machine was broken and the waitress never came back to check on us. I could see it if they would've been busy but we were the only ones there. Everyone was else was smart and went somewhere else!

name: Becky Ray
text: I ate the lunch buffet, which I normally love. The pizza was dry, and so hard you couldn't eat it. The pasta was dried out and seemed old. The salad was awesome as always, just wish there was more of a variety on the pizzas and more salad fixings.

name: Steven Joe Gordon
text: Everyone that works  here is supper friendly and the food is always fresh and from my own experience if you order ahead of time for carryout it's  correct when you get it. That alone is worth the 5 star rating in my book.

text: Went for pizza buffet and all the food was dried out. Got there at about 12:30. I mentioned it to the cashier. I was told after a certain time they are not allowed to put out fresh food.
